TopicTitle: wish for spring and electromagnetic catapult

Articles.Content:
Have anyone interestd in making a MOD including spring and electromagnetic catapult?

Maybe add gear wheel.

Thx.

If you want to have a mod, post it in the "General Add-on affairs" section, where mod requests should be. (Here) This is the spacecraft exchange for finished craft, if you have a craft requests, it fits in Rocket Builders.
There's an abandoned railgun mod that I finished, but I no longer have the license info...
